name: Andhra Pradesh
description: Andhra Pradesh, located in southeastern India, is known for its rich history, natural beauty, diverse cuisine, ancient temples, and traditional arts and crafts.

famous_foods.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
famous_foods.description: Hyderabadi Biryani is a fragrant rice dish from Hyderabad, usually made with meat and a blend of aromatic spices.

famous_foods.name: Andhra-style Chicken Fry
famous_foods.description: Andhra-style Chicken Fry is a spicy and crispy deep-fried chicken dish marinated in a blend of aromatic spices.

name: Arunachal Pradesh
description: Arunachal Pradesh, located in Northeast India, is a scenic state known for its Himalayan Mountains, diverse ethnic cultures, and wildlife.

famous_foods.name: Thukpa
famous_foods.description: A noodle soup made with vegetables, meat, and sometimes, eggs.

famous_foods.name: Momos
famous_foods.description: Steamed dumplings filled with meat or vegetables, served with spicy tomato or chili sauce.

name: Assam
description: Assam in Northeast India is a state known for its tea gardens, national parks, ethnic diversity, and vibrant festivals like Bihu.

famous_foods.name: Assam Tea
famous_foods.description: A strong, malty-flavored black tea that is famous around the world.

famous_foods.name: Masor Tenga
famous_foods.description: A sour fish curry made with tomatoes and lemon, a signature dish of Assamese cuisine.

name: Bihar
description: Bihar, located in East India, is a state known for its rich history, cultural heritage, and religious significance, as well as for producing famous intellectuals and leaders.

famous_foods.name: Litti Chokha
famous_foods.description: A traditional dish made of roasted wheat balls stuffed with sattu (gram flour), served with mashed potatoes, brinjal, and tomato chutney.

famous_foods.name: Chana Ghugni
famous_foods.description: A spicy curry made of black gram and potatoes, garnished with chopped onions, green chilies, and coriander leaves, often served with puri or paratha.

name: Chhattisgarh
description: Chhattisgarh, located in central India, is a state known for its rich cultural heritage, tribal communities, diverse wildlife, and natural resources, including forests, waterfalls, and minerals.

famous_foods.name: Farra
famous_foods.description: A steamed dumpling made of rice flour or wheat flour, stuffed with a mixture of chana dal, spices, and vegetables like peas, carrot, or beans, served with spicy chutney.

famous_foods.name: Chila
famous_foods.description: A pancake-like dish made of gram flour, onion, tomatoes, coriander leaves, and spices, cooked on a griddle, and served with chutney or yogurt, popular for breakfast or snack.

name: Goa
description: Goa, a small state in western India, is known for its pristine beaches, colonial-era architecture, vibrant nightlife, rich history, and diverse cuisine that blends Indian, Portuguese, and seafood influences.

famous_foods.name: Fish Curry
famous_foods.description: A spicy and tangy curry made with fresh fish, coconut milk, and spices like cumin, coriander, turmeric, and red chili, served with rice or bread.

famous_foods.name: Bebinca
famous_foods.description: A multi-layered pudding made with coconut milk, eggs, flour, sugar, and nutmeg, baked in a hot oven until golden brown and served as a dessert.

name: Gujarat
description: Gujarat is a western Indian state known for its rich cultural heritage, historic landmarks, vibrant textile industry, and mouth-watering vegetarian cuisine.
